title: Big Little
description: Whether you’re big or little, learning about opposites has never been more fun — or funny — than with this winning board book.Ladies are big, but ladybugs are little. Amiably illustrated in a bright, graphic style, Leslie Patricelli’s spirited board book,  Big Little , stars an obliging, bald, and very expressive toddler who acts out each pair of opposites with comically dramatic effect.
author: Leslie Patricelli
